repairedDockerfile:

FROM gcr.io/tensorflow/tensorflow:latest-devel

RUN pip install --no-cache-dir --upgrade pip
RUN apt-get update
RUN apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y unzip python-dev python-pip zlib1g-dev libjpeg-dev libblas-dev && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
RUN apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y liblapack-dev libatlas-base-dev libsnappy-dev libyaml-dev gfortran && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
RUN apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y python-scipy && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

RUN pip install --no-cache-dir sklearn nltk pillow setuptools
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir flask google-api-python-client
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir pandas python-snappy scipy scikit-learn requests uritemplate
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir --upgrade --force-reinstall https://storage.googleapis.com/cloud-ml/sdk/cloudml.latest.tar.gz

# RUN python -c "import nltk; nltk.download('punkt')"

RUN curl -f https://dl.google.com/dl/cloudsdk/channels/rapid/downloads/google-cloud-sdk-138.0.0-linux-x86_64.tar.gz | tar xvz
RUN ./google-cloud-sdk/install.sh -q
RUN ./google-cloud-sdk/bin/gcloud components install beta

ADD download_git_repo.py download_git_repo.py

# TensorBoard
EXPOSE 6006
# IPython
EXPOSE 8888
# Flask
EXPOSE 5000

CMD ["sh", "-c", "python download_git_repo.py ; /bin/bash"]
